Topic.Title: I'm Just Amazed with Axe software forums history

Posts.EditableText: [b:2rcy530x]I'm Just Amazed with Axe software forums history[/b:2rcy530x] Yesturday I've looked at the history on the chat section and on page 3 at the bottom (could have be moved if a lot of topic are made in the chat section) there is a bunch of locked topics and on the xlogan forums there is a lot of guest who started some of the topics there And if you know how to post has a guest post it here and I've noticed that I've seen a lot of polls about 'Should (name) be banned from the forums?' also I'm like the only guy right now that sometimes I post a topic with a poll Like this one There is someone called tr0n? Who is he? paul_one had this tr0n2 on his sighature intesting.... [color=red:2rcy530x]Please note that this post was posted on 8th December 2007 Things may have changed[/color:2rcy530x]
Posts.HTML:
I'm Just Amazed with Axe software forums history
Yesturday I've looked at the history on the chat section
and on page 3 at the bottom (could have be moved if a lot of topic are made in the chat section) there is a bunch of locked topics
and on the xlogan forums there is a lot of guest who started some of the topics there
And if you know how to post has a guest
post it here
and I've noticed that I've seen a lot of polls about 'Should (name) be banned from the forums?'
also I'm like the only guy right now that sometimes I post a topic with a poll
Like this one
There is someone called tr0n?
Who is he?
paul_one had this tr0n2 on his sighature
intesting....
Please note that this post was posted on 8th December 2007
Things may have changed
